message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I think we can find a price that works for both of us. I would like to propose a price of $95.
I understand that $95 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $100.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can offer it to you for $115.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I believe we're getting closer. I would like to propose a price of $105.
I'm getting a bit anxious to close the deal, but I'm still willing to give you a good deal. I can offer it to you for $112.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $110.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $115, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $112.50
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering our previous negotiations, I would like to propose a final price of $110.
